TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CommandLineHandler(object o, CommandLineArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed CommandLineHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the CommandLineHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the CommandLineHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the CommandLineHandler is removed from the event.
